00004 #include "CGuardRobot.h"

00007 const int PREPAREFIRE_TIME = 6;
00008 // frames
00009 const int WALK_LEFT_FRAME = 116;
00010 const int WALK_RIGHT_FRAME = 112;
00011 const int LOOK_FRAME = 120;
00012 
00013 const int PREPAREFIRE_TIME_FAST = 22;
00014 const int WAITAFTER_FIRE = 14;
00015 
00016 const int TRAVELDIST = 100;
00017 
00018 const int SAME_LEVEL_TIME = 150;
00019 const int SHOTS_PER_VOLLEY = 4;
00020 const int MIN_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE = 31;
00021 const int MAX_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE = 200;
00022 const int TIME_BETWEEN_SHOTS = 12;
00023 const int TIME_BEFORE_FIRE_WHEN_SEE = 6;
00024 const int TIME_BETWEEN_FIRE_CAUSE_LEVEL = 25;
00025 
00026 const int WALK_SPEED = 31;
00027 const unsigned int WALK_ANIM_TIME = 6;
00028 const unsigned int LOOK_ANIM_TIME = 4;
00029 const unsigned int LOOK_TOTALTIME = 25;
00030 
00031 const int FIRE_PAUSE_TIME = 25;
00032 
00033 CGuardRobot::CGuardRobot(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00034   std::vector<CObject*>& Object) :
00035 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_GUARDROBOT),
00036 m_ObjectVect(Object)
00037 {
00038  //first time initilization
00039  state = TANK_WALK;
00040  movedir = RIGHT;
00041  fireafterlook = 0;
00042  animtimer = 0;
00043  timer = 0;
00044  dist_to_travel = TRAVELDIST;
00045  pausetime = 0;
00046  timetillcanfire = MAX_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE;
00047  firetimes = 0;
00048  turnaroundtimer = 0;
00049 
00050  canbezapped = true;   // will stop bullets but is not harmed
00051  m_invincible = true;
00052  inhibitfall = true;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void CGuardRobot::process()
00056 {
00057  switch(state)
00058  {
00059  case TANK_LOOK:
00060   // animation
00061   if (animtimer > LOOK_ANIM_TIME)
00062   {
00063    frame ^= 1;
00064    animtimer = 0;
00065   }
00066   else
00067    animtimer++;
00068 
00069   sprite = LOOK_FRAME + frame;
00070 
00071   // when time is up go back to moving
00072   if (timer > LOOK_TOTALTIME)
00073   {
00074    alreadyfiredcauseonsamelevel = 0;
00075    timetillcanfire = (rnd()%(MAX_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE-MIN_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE))+MIN_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE;
00076    timetillcanfirecauseonsamelevel = TIME_BEFORE_FIRE_WHEN_SEE;
00077    firetimes = 0;
00078    state = TANK_WALK;
00079    frame = 0;
00080    animtimer = 0;
00081    timer = 0;
00082    dist_to_travel = TRAVELDIST;
00083   }
00084   else
00085    timer++;
00086 
00087   break;
00088 
00089  case TANK_WALK:
00090   // hover animation
00091   if (animtimer > WALK_ANIM_TIME)
00092   {
00093    if (frame>=3) frame=0;
00094    else frame++;
00095    animtimer = 0;
00096   } else animtimer++;
00097 
00098   if (movedir==LEFT)
00099    sprite = WALK_LEFT_FRAME + frame;
00100   else
00101    sprite = WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + frame;
00102 
00103   // if we're about to, or just did, fire a volley, don't move
00104   if (!hardmode)
00105   {
00106    if (pausetime)
00107    {
00108     pausetime--;
00109     return;
00110    }
00111   }
00112   else
00113    pausetime = 0;
00114 
00115   // are we firing a volley?
00116   if (firetimes)
00117   {
00118    // is it time to fire the next shot in the volley?
00119    if (!timetillnextshot)
00120    {
00121     CRay *newobject;
00122     if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_TANK_FIRE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00123     if (movedir==RIGHT)
00124      newobject = new CRay(mp_Map,getXRightPos()+(8<<STC), getYUpPos()+(5<<STC), RIGHT);
00125     else
00126      newobject = new CRay(mp_Map,getXPosition(), getYUpPos()+(5<<STC), LEFT);
00127     newobject->setOwner(OBJ_GUARDROBOT, m_index);
00128     newobject->sprite = ENEMYRAYEP2;
00129 
00130     m_ObjectVect.push_back(newobject);
00131 
00132     timetillnextshot = TIME_BETWEEN_SHOTS;
00133     if (!--firetimes)
00134     {
00135      pausetime = FIRE_PAUSE_TIME;
00136     }
00137    }
00138    else
00139    {
00140     timetillnextshot--;
00141    }
00142 
00143    // don't move when firing except on hard mode
00144    if (hardmode)
00145     return;
00146 
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {  // not firing a volley
00150    if (!timetillcanfire)
00151    {
00152     tank2_fire();
00153    }
00154    else
00155    {
00156     timetillcanfire--;
00157    }
00158 
00159   }
00160 
00161   // is keen on same level?
00162   alreadyfiredcauseonsamelevel = 0;
00163   turnaroundtimer = 0;
00164 
00165   if (movedir==LEFT)
00166   {  // move left
00167    if (!blockedl)
00168    {
00169     xinertia = -WALK_SPEED;
00170     dist_to_travel--;
00171    }
00172    else
00173    {
00174     frame = 0;
00175     timer = 0;
00176     animtimer = 0;
00177     state = TANK_LOOK;
00178     movedir = RIGHT;
00179    }
00180   }
00181   else
00182   {  // move right
00183    sprite = WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + frame;
00184    if (!blockedr)
00185    {
00186     xinertia = WALK_SPEED;
00187     dist_to_travel--;
00188    }
00189    else
00190    {
00191     frame = 0;
00192     timer = 0;
00193     animtimer = 0;
00194     state = TANK_LOOK;
00195     movedir = LEFT;
00196    }
00197   }
00198   break;
00199  default : break;
00200  }
00201 }
00202 
00203 // makes the tank start firing
00204 void CGuardRobot::tank2_fire()
00205 {
00206  firetimes = SHOTS_PER_VOLLEY;
00207  timetillnextshot = 0;
00208  timetillcanfire = (rnd()%(MAX_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE-MIN_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE))+MIN_TIME_TILL_CAN_FIRE;
00209  pausetime = FIRE_PAUSE_TIME;
00210 }
